original_title: My Grandmother Sits in the Garden
overview: In "My Grandmother Sits in the Garden", Jack Guariento delightfully employs a VHS tape format to mimic the feel of old home movies, in a warm and wise essayistic rumination on the relative nature of time, the cosmic interrelatedness of people, places and things, and the making of pasta sauce.
title: My Grandmother Sits in the Garden
